Instruction: Trim the ends of the Brussels sprouts and cut them in half.
In a large bowl,  toss the Brussels sprouts with olive oil, maple syrup, salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.
Spread the Brussels sprouts in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes,  or until the Brussels sprouts are tender and caramelized,  stirring halfway through cooking.
Remove from the oven and sprinkle with cooked and crumbled bacon before serving.
Enjoy hot as a sweet and savory side dish.
